title: Exquisite Navratna Tassel Haaram with South Sea Pearl Centerpiece
materials: 22K Gold Plating over Sterling Silver Base. Navratna Gemstones (Ruby
Coral). South Sea Pearl (Center). The chain is crafted from Tourmaline Gemstone Beads.
features: This unique Haaram showcases a modern take on traditional Navratna settings. The centerpiece features a radiant South Sea pearl, surrounded by a meticulously arranged array of Navratna gemstones in a floral pattern. Two elegant gemstone tassels hang below: one is a beaded pink tourmaline and the other is a cascade of small seed pearls. The gold-plated silver base features a fine detailing, achieved with a meticulous casting and polishing process. The vibrant gemstone arrangements and delicate pearl tassels create a mesmerizing visual harmony.
occasions: and grand celebrations. Can also be styled for festive occasions like Sankranthi and Ugadi.
description: A unique blend of traditional symbolism and modern design. The use of high-quality Navratna gemstones makes this piece not just beautiful but also astrologically significant. The South Sea pearl adds a touch of timeless elegance. The modern design makes it versatile and wearable beyond traditional occasions. Hyderabadi craftsmanship ensures exceptional durability and lasting beauty.
